backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law 507-2021 - 447- 453 Adelaide Street West

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 507-2021 to amend By-law 115-2020, being a by-law to designate the property at 447- 453 Adelaide Street West (Ward 10 Spadina-Fort York) as being of cultural heritage value or interest, to correct a technical error.

otherReferenceList.description: By-law 507-2021 - To amend By-law 115-2020, being a by-law to designate the property at 447-453 Adelaide Street West, to correct a technical error
